content: Hi I'm Nathan, I'm a java (kotlin if i get lucky, and and now go-lang) goon professionally for $TOO_MANY years and started doing some Rust stuff while I've had some bench time recently. I'm largely here to lurk and primarily motivated by looking for some support with some of the language

FYI if you're looking help with learning rust, you may get faster feedback on https://users.rust-lang.org/ or the discord server; Zulip is mostly used for working on the language itself. Feel free to lurk though :)
thanks, i had got the impression that the discord was mostly abandoned but i might not have looked hard enough

I find that official discord not that interesting any more, with so many things moving here instead, but the community discord is quite active and IMHO a better place for support than the official discord.
